title: Minigame while in loading screen
body: There should be a minigame while in the loading screen, I don't currently have an idea of one, but it would be good if they could do that, a small game like tic tac toe, or rock paper scissors. anything would be fun.

replies.body:
{{sticker:poppy-wink}} 

 keep individual scores for each person and have a minigame tab on the profile. Each game loads a different minigame, things like:

Hangman  (make sure its an actual word and keep it to similar languages) 
Tic Tac Toe
Rock Paper Scisors

Maybe even things like card games with gamble-able points.

OH and also some sort of trivia quiz :>
It should be an instructional video on how to install a solid-state drive.
